title: Additional Glowing
description: Adds additional gameplay features to utilise the glowing effect and glowing items

features.label: Spectral Arrows will glow yellow when fired
Piglins with Crossbows will always fire Spectral Arrows
Climbing cave vines with berries growing will cause you to glow
Consuming Glow berries will cause you to glow
Coming in close contact with a glow squid will make the squid glow
Compatible with Minecraft 1.18 and up, last tested on Minecraft 1.20
